overview: Starring Master P and Lil' Romeo, Decisions was also written and directed by Master P. The film is a whodunit tale done 'hood style and steeped in the age-old themes of good versus evil, along with some important life decisions made along the way. Bonus features include all-new (unseen) footage as well as two music videos, "Them Jeans" and "Act Like a Fool."
title: Master P: Decisions
